Item.name: Hard Helmet
Item.description: A relatively modern, brightly colored lightweight aluminum helmet designed with a head harness system, designed to greatly reduce impact of blunt force trauma to the skull. However, it does very little against threats such as predator's maws, and absolutely nothing against a bullet.

Item.name: Demolitionist Helmet
Item.description: A super heavy, reinforced ballistic helmet with lots of padding and special flak lining with a thick ballistic visor, designed to stop shrapnel and fragmentation from scrambling one's brains.

Item.name: Veteran's Helmet
Item.description: A very, very old spiked metal helmet from Terra, embellsihed with well-worn ornamentations and wrought in an archaic style from hard iron. Feels like something like this belongs in a museum moreso than on your head.

Item.name: Skid Lid
Item.description: A cheap, old-school steel helmet, designed to protect largely against shrapnel and blunt force trauma moreso than direct bullets and alien predator's jaws.

Item.name: Rhino Assault Helmet
Item.description: A heavy-duty, full-head helmet with an integrated automatic rebreather system as well as a litany of protective elements, designed to give the upmost protection in the most dire of circumstances.

Item.name: Assault Shield
Item.description: A relatively compact reinforced tactical shield, much more easily held and manuever in one hand compared to full riot shield designs. However, it lacks the coverage of it's larger brethren.

Item.name: Rhino Assault Suit
Item.description: A heavy-duty, fully armored combat suit designed for war, not for deep-sea diving. Still, it provides a modicum of pressure resistance for shallow diving, but will slow you down terribly in water. Includes a wide number of tactical drop pouches and bits of room for equipment, and makes you practically bulletproof.

Item.name: Lynx Exoskeleton Suit
Item.description: A relatively slim, lightweight minimally-powered exoskeleton, greatly increasing it's wearer's speed, strength and stability. While it fails to offer the protection of full-body diving suits or body armor, it makes the wearer much more agile, though it does absolutely nothing for the water.

Item.name: Riot Gear
Item.description: A set of lightweight ballistic armor reinforced with shock-absorbant materials and padding, designed to protect most of the body against blunt force impact and trauma. It also includes a number of handy utility pouches, for keeping vital equipment close at hand.

Item.name: Demolitionist Suit
Item.description: A heavy-duty, flame-retardant and impact-resistant suit reinforced with steel and refractive ballistic plating, designed to stop shrapnel and blunt force impact from shredding someone apart from all but the heaviest of explosions. A bit bulky to move around in, but highly protective against explosive threats- less so against others. Includes handy pouches in the legs for storing equipment close at hand.

Item.name: Hauler Exosuit
Item.description: A depleted-fuel alloy made ultraheavy hydraulic nuclear-powered heavy lift exosuit, designed for industrial applications in all sorts of hazardous conditions. It lacks the extreme depth resistance of traditional diving Exosuits, but provides the wearer with incredible strength, and grants the ability to carry large quantities of extremely bulky items. It also has great environmental hazard protection characteristics.

Item.name: Buster Exosuit
Item.description: An ultraheavy hydraulic nuclear-powered heavy combat exosuit, designed for military combat operations against light vehicles and infantry alike, ideally on land. It lacks the extreme depth resistance of traditional diving Exosuits, but provides the wearer with incredible strength, and unparalleled protection. It also has great environmental hazard protection characteristics.

Item.name: Light Ballistic Armor
Item.description: A minimally protective lightweight ballistic vest. Inlcudes small tactical loops to hold equipment or some loose shells.
